title: Disconnect
body:
I was playing earlier on my alt account and my game lost connection while I was dying. I lost connection completely, so I closed my game and restarted it. So I opened the client patcher and re-logged in. It didn't give me an option to reconnect, and I was stuck in the main lobby. I checked my match history to see if somebody ended (the game was fairly close to being over), and the game isn't there. I used my LoLSumo app to see if the game was still going, and it was. Now I'm not sure what to do.

EDIT: The game is over but isn't in my match history.

replies.body: Damn, that's pretty heckin' weird. Did this game eventually show up in your match history or did it never end up being in there?
Nope. Never showed up. I'm assuming this happened to the rest of the people in the game too.
That could very well be, assuming this happened because of a game server hiccup. If this happens again, please let me know.
